column4: hello can someone help me setup a dual monitor ? I tried changing the nvidia x server settings, but can;t get to activate both the monitors at the same time
and the other is a laptop?
is that what you've been using trying to activate the 2nd monitor?
Izinucs: nvidia settings overwrites the xorg.conf file in /etc. Is there something else I am supposed to do ?
how did you install the nvidia driver with the one in System>Admin>hardware drivers or did you do it manually after downloading from nvidia?
i believe i did it from  rpmfusion as a repo

I don't know that repo.. personally I use a PPA designed for ubuntu.. x-swat .. nvidia-settings when done right *will* create entries in xorg.conf.. initially there isn't anything in there because of the neuvou (sp?) driver and xrandr..
I just got the monitor yesterday. I will try installing from nvidia website

could be that repo didn't configure the install correctly by disabling the opensource driver correctly.. x-swat will.  you're in for a nightmare if you try from the nvidia website.. it's not like it was 2-3 releases ago when it was easy
